title: EDH Power
description: A full stack application that allows users to register Magic The Gathering decks to their account and then easily collect ratings from other players for their decks.

title: Online Multiplayer Connect 4
description: A full stack application where two users can connect and play a game of connect 4 over the internet

title: Coffee Menu

title: Prime Number Counter
